content: Are there any publicly available stats on zulip as a means of showing how active the community is?

Does anyone know what the criteria is for being 'active' - does it mean that your account has queried the server at least once in the last x months? I'm pretty sure it can't be driven by who's posted in the last X months unless X is very long indeed...
How neat...Wish it wasn't all the Implementers channel and instead could be better segmented by interest
According to what I see playing with it, 15 day rolling average shows ~900 active users
@Lloyd McKenzie the "daily" / "2 week" active numbers are based on interacting with a Zulip client connected to the server (e.g. moving the mouse or keyboard with a browser window focused on web).
The "total active users" is just counting users whose accounts have not been deactivated.
